channel.title: Wow
channel.description: I'm not quite sure if this is the place to post it, but now two well-known private servers have been shut down; 2006Scape and Near Reality (a few hours ago). Makes me wonder how corrupt someone really can be.

item.title: Wow
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:35, topic:477887”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=596085.msg4198006#msg4198006 date=1357786536]

Mod Timbo is a Jagex Moderator and member of the Community Management team. As of 2011, he acts as the clan support lead curator.

He isn’t even a Developer/Designer. He fags up the game with Clan Events & makes people waste more time to get the Completionist Cape.

This guy is pissing me off already.

Easy solution, don’t play RuneScape?
[/quote]

I don’t even play RuneScape. I don’t play R.S.P.S. either.

EDIT TO YOUR EDIT: We can complain, because It’s Public. If they don’t want people yelling at them for screwing up their own game, then they should do something else. Listening to their community and realizing “Users only like Updates that make things better” would be a great start for them.[/quote]
The problem is, they have never quite understood how to depict which users to listen to. It has been like this since the start, so I’m pretty sure everyone saw this eventually coming.

Read full topic

EDIT TO YOUR EDIT: We can complain, because It’s Public. If they don’t want people yelling at them for screwing up their own game, then they should do something else. Listening to their community and realizing “Users only like Updates that make things better” would be a great start for them.

item.title: Wow
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Clawz fury:

wtf??? near reality got shut down?? this is getting worse and worse. we need to do something.

LEtS SUE JEGAX

What the hell are you going to do? You’re doing something illegal, they have every right to shut you down. That’s like saying, “Let’s do something about these damn cops that keep stopping our robberies!” while you’re being held in supervised police custody.

Read full topic

item.title: Wow
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:22, topic:477887”]vault is gay anyways he probably ran off with the money but if jagex did shut them down then good riddance loael

Nr though I was surprised[/quote]

Also,

Lin:

I think what David needs to do is keep the cache and client hosted off of his website and for a webclient, create an applet that embeds a Java application. Nothing illegal since the donations are for forum benefits and he’s not distributing any of Jagex’s property.

Make a source that can connect to mopar’s client. Then, mopar would get blamed. Owait, mopar pwned jagex, so if youy can make your server run of moparscape client, you’re good.

Read full topic

item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Those numbers aren’t exaggerated. Rene, the owner of Arrav, has shown me over teamviewer some of his money from a month a work. His server only averages 700 online and he’s making $40k a month. I’ve seen it first hand.

item.title: Wow
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:11, topic:477887”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=596085.msg4196950#msg4196950 date=1357626701]

I think what David needs to do is keep the cache and client hosted off of his website and for a webclient, create an applet that embeds a Java application. Nothing illegal since the donations are for forum benefits and he’s not distributing any of Jagex’s property.

If they want it shut down, Jagex will shut it down regardless of what he does.
[/quote]They would have no right. It would be like shutting down a search engine because it told people where to go to download software.[/quote]
The official website/forums didn’t get shut down, only links that hosted the client files.

Read full topic

item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Jagex doesn’t care if you’re not making real profit, MITB / Moparscape I wouldn’t really worry about because we sell next to nothing on here and all the money goes to hosting and buying shit code that doesn’t even go anywhere because MITB has a child.

item.title: Wow
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:11, topic:477887”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=596085.msg4196950#msg4196950 date=1357626701]

I think what David needs to do is keep the cache and client hosted off of his website and for a webclient, create an applet that embeds a Java application. Nothing illegal since the donations are for forum benefits and he’s not distributing any of Jagex’s property.

If they want it shut down, Jagex will shut it down regardless of what he does.
[/quote]They would have no right. It would be like shutting down a search engine because it told people where to go to download software.[/quote]

Prove to me they have no right. In court it doesn’t matter who is actually right and who is actually wrong as long as you have grounds and a way to prove your case then you win. Do you think anyone would risk the process of going through court for something as stupid as a RSPS? No. There will always be legal trouble, how far they want to go depends on Jagex.

Read full topic
